DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the change of penile corpus cavernosum after caudal block using ultrasonography in pediatric patient.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Change of Penile Corpus Cavernosum After Caudal Block Using Ultrasonography in Children
DOC.criteria: 1. Twenty (ASA status I or II) children, ages 2 to 7 yr old, who were scheduled for a urologic surgery 2. Children who needed caudal block for postoperative analgesia 1. if there were contraindications for caudal block including hypersensitivity to any local anaesthetics, bleeding diathesis, infections at the puncture sites, or preexisting neurological disease. 2. patients scheduled for penile surgery
